content:
Hello Everyone,

Can you guys give me proper guidance about how to implement Search for FHIR because i have issue to understand from where i need to start and how to pass the parameters?

First, look here: https://wiki.hl7.org/FHIR_Rules_for_asking_questions
Then read the page on search here: http://hl7.org/fhir/search.html
Then try playing around with the various public test servers, such as http://test.fhir.org
When you have more specific questions and can let us know what you've tried and is giving you difficulty, we'll be happy to help
